item.title: Install Windows 8 Consumer Preview as VM in VMware vSphere 5
item.description: Today the Windows 8 Consumer Preview is launched. To install the Windows 8 Consumer Preview as VM in VMware vSphere 5, use the following steps: Install VMware ESXi 5.0 patch release ESXi500-201112001 . If you didnâ€™t install the patch the following screen appears when booting the Windows 8 ISO: Your computer ran into a problem and needs to restart When the patch is installed, create a new VM and choose the following settings: 1.
